Stefan, 

can you remember what you did?

Markus, 

can you please investigate. From looking at the code it might have something

re: comment 1

I was testing for multimonitor bugs relating to dialog position, so I was trying
to open every dialog in Eclipse....

In other words, I might have been doing anything. :-)

Thanks for logging it. I was also surprised that it was just in the log and you
didn't get an error dialog. I'll correct that as well, such that in the future,
other error conditions will be properly reported in the UI.
Verified by Danny Dig. Works fine now.
